name: Mod Pls
description:
Congratulations! You are the only mod for a new streamer, Justin Twitchman. Justin has brought you on as a moderator because their stream has become a viral hit, and as a result, their chat has become infested with spammers, opportunities and people not following the rules. You will be needed to keep the chat under some semblance of control using your moderator actions and permissions.

The better the chat has been moderated, the more viewers that will watch the stream, making the streamer happy, but the more people watching the stream also means the more bad behaviour occurs. Can you keep the chat in control?
